about_the_game:
Overview

The Battle of Embers is an immersive high fantasy RPG defense multiplayer survival game set in a mystical world called Ehlingard, it has ancient spells, fantastic creatures, different regions and histories. Players take on the role of heroes in different quests to defend their cities against hordes of evil creatures.




Game Mode

Guardian Challenge:

In this intense game mode, players must defend a crucial area against waves of relentless enemies within a set time limit. Armed with a variety of weapons and strategic tools, players collaborate to thwart the onslaught. Team coordination, quick thinking, and skillful combat are essential as the difficulty escalates with each wave.

Treasure Hunt Expedition:

Embark on an adventurous Dungeon Explore mode where players delve into mysterious underground labyrinths in search of powerful and rare equipment. Traverse through dark corridors, solve puzzles, and confront formidable foes guarding precious loot. The deeper you go, the greater the rewards. Team up with fellow explorers or brave the depths solo to discover hidden chambers filled with legendary gear.

Boss Blitz Showdown:

Brace yourself for the ultimate test of skill and strategy in the Boss Challenge mode. Players face a series of colossal and menacing bosses, each with unique abilities and attack patterns. The objective is clear – defeat them all. Gather your team, coordinate your attacks, and adapt to the changing tactics of each boss. With limited resources and no room for error, every decision matters.

Perpetual Gauntlet:

In this relentless mode, players must navigate through a never-ending series of challenging levels. Each level presents increasingly difficult obstacles, puzzles, and enemies. The catch? No respawns and no breaks. Players must strategize, adapt, and demonstrate precision to overcome each level's unique challenges.

Key Features:

Diverse Hero Selection:

Choose from a variety of heroes inspired by classic high fantasy archetypes, each with unique abilities and roles, including warriors, knights, archers, and sorcerers.

Engaging Third-Person Combat:

Immerse yourself in intense third-person combat, utilizing a wide range of close and ranged abilities to strategically defeat waves of fantastical foes.

RPG Defense Mechanics:

Face progressively challenging waves of enemies, with evolving encounters and epic boss battles that provide a sense of achievement when overcome.

Teamwork and Roles:

Join forces with other players in cooperative multiplayer matches, taking on specialized roles such as tank, damage, and support. Effective communication and coordination are crucial for success.

Resource Management:

Collect and manage resources like mana and gold to construct and upgrade character stats, purchase items, and improve hero abilities. Resource allocation and economy management are integral to gameplay.

Immersive High Fantasy Setting:

Explore a rich and immersive high fantasy world filled with diverse landscapes, enchanted forests, ancient ruins, and foreboding dungeons.

Mythical Creature Variety:

Encounter a wide array of mythical and high fantasy creatures, each with unique behaviors, strengths, and weaknesses. Epic boss battles at the end of waves challenge your strategies and cooperation.

Flexible spell System:

Dive into deep lore and harness mystical energies for offense and defense. The game's flexible magic system plays a pivotal role in both the narrative and gameplay.

Multiplayer Modes:

Experience both cooperative and competitive multiplayer modes, encouraging teamwork and offering unique objectives and challenges. Utilize in-game voice chat and text communication for effective coordination.

Leaderboards and Ranking:

Climb leaderboards and showcase your skills with ranking systems that highlight top-performing teams and players. Seasonal rewards and competitive incentives maintain player engagement.

Cosmetics:

Personalize your heroes with high fantasy-themed cosmetic skins.

Expansions and Content Packs:

Explore paid expansions offering additional high fantasy worlds, heroes, and challenges for players seeking new and exciting adventures.

Regular Updates and Community Engagement:

Stay engaged with frequent updates, bug fixes, and new content. Engage with the community through official forums, feedback channels, and social media, providing input and suggestions for ongoing improvements.


Credit:
Trailer Music Fuzzeke - The Truth
Some 3D models from used in the game will be credited in game screens

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel i5 8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GBs VRAM | NVIDIA GTX-1060 | AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic journey in a high fantasy RPG defense multiplayer survival game that thrusts you into a mystical world of ancient spells, legendary creatures, and intense battles. As a hero, your mission is to defend against hordes of fantastical foes in a desperate quest for survival.
